member.name: M:Novartis.Msi.MSImageView.RoiProjectWindow.OpenAllViewImages
member.summary: This method opens all the Unique Images. It does this by going through the list of ROI and finding unique Images. For each Unique image it associates all the ROI's attached to this image. Step 1 Find all the unique paths in roiObjects Step 2 Set the ImageData for each ROI (from open doc) Step 3 For each generated Imageview set ROI Objects

member.name: P:Novartis.Msi.MSImageView.Strings.UsageText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unless you specify '/batch' none of the other switches will come to effect. If you omit all switches, the program will start in interactive mode and the specified file(s), if any, will be loaded. If [/outdir path] is given, the results of a conversion (/saveas) or bitmap creation (/bitmap) will be created in the given directory..
